subject: Zenyatta (Race Horse)
Breeders' Cup (Horse Race)
Horse Racing
Awards, Decorations and Honors
Horses
lead_paragraph: In the weeks ahead, Zenyatta’s qualifications for the Horse of the Year honor will be pontificated upon with the fractured logic that has helped erode horse racing.
